start.speaker: Sweet Peep
start.text: 🌸 Hello! This is Sweet Peep testing the multi-bot system.

orlin_test.text: 🔧 Orlin here from the workshop - systems are running smoothly!

cloudbelle_test.text: ✨ CloudBelle joining in - peace and blessings to all!

zeph_test.speaker: Zeph
zeph_test.text: 🌬️ Zeph brings the winds of completion - **Test Complete** - All 5 bots coordinated successfully! ✅
